name: part_007
file: tmp_【#沙花叉クロヱ3D】シャチ出没注意【ホロライブ】 [MOekZ-g5qJQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Chloe performs various cute and sexy poses on a blue stage during her 3D debut bonus section.
Chloe is showered with casino chips as a reward for her performance.
Chloe interacts with the audience's comments and prepares to transition to the next stage.
An underwater transition scene where Chloe swims with fish and is chased by a giant orca.
Chloe arrives at the new Casino stage and expresses her excitement.

subtitles.original: イェーイ、ブリッチブリッチって感じだよね
subtitles.english: Yay, it feels like bridge-bridge, doesn't it?

subtitles.original: よかった。いこっか。あとはあとは…
subtitles.english: Great. Let's go. And then, and then...

subtitles.original: え、上がってない？みんな大丈夫？
subtitles.english: Wait, isn't it going up? Is everyone okay?

subtitles.original: あ、ちょっとカメラさんしっかりしてもらえるかな、ねえねえねえ
subtitles.english: Ah, wait, cameraman, can you do your job properly? Hey, hey, hey!

subtitles.original: どう考えてもさ、出来てたよね今の
subtitles.english: No matter how you look at it, I did it just now, right?

subtitles.original: 取り方悪いんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Maybe the angle was bad?

subtitles.original: ごめん、おこらないで。やーだ
subtitles.english: Sorry, don't get mad. No way~

subtitles.original: じゃあちょっと、マリン先輩のポーズしよっか。いくよ？
subtitles.english: Then, shall I do Marine-senpai's pose? Here I go!

subtitles.original: あはーん
subtitles.english: A-haan~

subtitles.original: え、どう？セクシー？どうどうどう？
subtitles.english: Well, how is it? Sexy? How is it, how is it?

subtitles.original: どうですか？
subtitles.english: How about it?

subtitles.original: これ、これでいいのか、本当に
subtitles.english: Is this, is this really okay?

subtitles.original: 体育座り、あー、ペタン座り。いいよ。体育座りはさっきやったっけ？
subtitles.english: Sitting with knees up, ah, sitting flat. Sure. Did I do the knees-up pose earlier?

subtitles.original: どう？どうですか？
subtitles.english: How is it? How about this?

subtitles.original: ん？次、この次ぐらいにラストにしよっか。いい？
subtitles.english: Hmm? Next, let's make the one after this the last one. Okay?

subtitles.original: じゃあ、最後の何にしよっかな？何にしよっかな？
subtitles.english: Then, what should the last one be? What should it be?

subtitles.original: よいしょ。ん？あとは…
subtitles.english: Heave-ho. Hmm? What else...

subtitles.original: 飼育員さんたちって、比較坂又に優しいって噂聞いたんだけど、みんな大丈夫かな？
subtitles.english: I heard a rumor that the interns are relatively kind to Sakamata, but is everyone okay?

subtitles.original: だっちゅーのポーズ。だっちゅーのポーズって誰？こういうやつ？いくよ？
subtitles.english: The "Dac-chu" pose. Who does the "Dac-chu" pose? Something like this? Here I go!

subtitles.original: だっちゅーの！
subtitles.english: Dac-chu-no!

subtitles.original: どう？どう？
subtitles.english: How is it? How is it?

subtitles.original: OK、よかったー！やったーよかったー！
subtitles.english: OK, that's good! Yay, I'm glad!

subtitles.original: あ！めっちゃ！
subtitles.english: Ah! So many!

subtitles.original: やばー！めっちゃもらった！見て！すごい！
subtitles.english: No way! I got so many! Look! Amazing!

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃいっぱいもらった。これ、これいっぱい欲しかったこれ
subtitles.english: I got a crazy amount. This, I really wanted a lot of this.

subtitles.original: そうそうこれ。しまっときまーす。大事な奥の方にしまっときまーす
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, this. I'll put it away. I'll store it deep inside.

subtitles.original: よし！よかったよかった
subtitles.english: Right! Good, good.

subtitles.original: じゃ、沙花叉クロヱの、こんなに可愛かった沙花叉クロヱちゃんのボーナスステージもおしまいですが
subtitles.english: Well, Sakamata Chloe's—that's the end of Chloe-chan's super cute bonus stage, but...

subtitles.original: 実は、ステージ、ここだけじゃないんです
subtitles.english: Actually, this isn't the only stage.

subtitles.original: おお、みんな、どんなステージだと思う？どんなだと思う？予想してみて。みんなのコメント見るわ
subtitles.english: Oh, what kind of stage do you think it is? What kind? Try to guess. I'll check everyone's comments.

subtitles.original: みんなの反応かわいいな。うん。おお、あ、でもみんなの予想、いい感じだよ。かなりいい感じ。近いよだいぶ
subtitles.english: Everyone's reactions are so cute. Yeah. Oh, but everyone's guesses are pretty good. Really good. It's quite close.

subtitles.original: 風呂？ねえ、誰が3Dでお風呂入るんだよって。普段から入らないのに、お風呂入るわけないだろ3Dで
subtitles.english: A bath? Hey, who's going to take a bath in 3D? I don't even take them normally, so there's no way I'd do it in 3D!

subtitles.original: じゃ、次のステージに移りたいと思いまーす。移動、レッツゴー！
subtitles.english: Now, I'd like to move on to the next stage. Moving, let's go!

subtitles.original: 呼びに行きます、お呼びに行きます
subtitles.english: I'll go call them, I'll go call them.

subtitles.original: お魚だー、なんか食べよっかな、どれ食べよっかな
subtitles.english: It's a fish~ I wonder what I should eat, which one should I eat~

subtitles.original: 助けて！助けて！あー！これじゃあ無理！嫌だー助けて！
subtitles.english: Help! Help! Ah! This is impossible! No! Help!

subtitles.original: 仲間、仲間、フレンド、フレンドだよ。わかる？フレンズ！
subtitles.english: We're comrades, comrades! Friends, we're friends! You get it? Friends!

subtitles.original: OK？フレンズ！
subtitles.english: OK? Friends!

subtitles.original: あー助けて！助けて！誰か！誰か助けて！ううー！
subtitles.english: Ah! Help! Help! Somebody! Somebody help me! *Whimper*

subtitles.original: じゃーん！ここどこでしょうかみんな！
subtitles.english: Tada! Where are we, everyone?

subtitles.original: さっき当ててくれてる子もいたんですけど、じゃーん！なんとカジノでーす！
subtitles.english: Some of you guessed it earlier, but tada! It's actually a casino!

subtitles.original: やったー！カジノ通ったんだよ。凄くない？いやマジで運営さんたち本当にありがとうございました
subtitles.english: Yay! I got the casino approved! Isn't that amazing? No, seriously, staff, thank you so much.

subtitles.original: ロマンをたくさんありがとうございましたといった感じで
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for all the romance, so to speak.

subtitles.original: で、あのね、ここめちゃくちゃ色々ねロマンが溢れた設備が…
subtitles.english: And you know, this place has so many features overflowing with romance...
